Articles.Content:
The blue lines did not appear when I attached the base on the bottom of my payload, and when I tried putting on a fairing, nothing happened.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T03:37:54Z" title="02/22/2015 03:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by DuoDex**
a little more detail, as well as a picture or two might help, but it sounds like you have an older version, make sure you have updated to the latest version of procedural fairings.

Nope. I got the latest version, with KSPAPIExtensions manually updated to the latest version.

![cX2xj70.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cX2xj70.jpg)

> 
> Nope. I got the latest version, with KSPAPIExtensions manually updated to the latest version.
> [http://i.imgur.com/cX2xj70.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cX2xj70.jpg)

ignore
I think you're better off asking **here.**
Found the problem i think. I think it was about the depricated folder which I removed.
